sentences.english: The Nokia 1209 also has a one-piece key mat for durability and reliability.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚1209也同样是一款耐用和可靠的好机型。

sentences.english: Nokia said the N8 would be widely available in coming weeks."The
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚称，N8将在未来几周内得到广泛应用。

sentences.english: Nokia will introduce the service in Britain. The price has not been decided.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚将在英国首先推出这项功能，其价格尚未确定。

sentences.english: How much sales has music handsets brought for Nokia in 2006?
sentences.chinese: 2006年诺基亚音乐手机带来的销售额有多大？

sentences.english: Nokia has just announced its worst-ever results.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚刚刚公布了它有史以来最差的财报。

sentences.english: Nokia also disclosed the pricing of its N97 phone.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚还公布了N97手机的价格。

sentences.english: Currently, Nokia E60 uses the keyboard.
You know there are many people tracking each and every move of Nokia.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，许多人追踪着诺基亚的一举一动。

sentences.english: Wang Xia has been working for Nokia Research for over 12 years.
sentences.chinese: 王霞在诺基亚研究院已经工作了12个春秋。

sentences.english: Nokia diversified into televisions and computers without much success.
sentences.chinese: 后来，诺基亚涉足电视和电脑业务，均未获成功。

sentences.english: Maps Updater requires Nokia PC Suite to be installed on your computer.
sentences.chinese: 地图更新需要诺基亚PC套件将您的计算机上安装。

sentences.english: Nokia can expect more of the same rockiness.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚还可能遭遇更多的同类问题。

sentences.english: That's why we welcome the Nokia Music Store," he said.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们欢迎诺基亚音乐库的原因。

sentences.english: The Nokia N900 handset uses ARM chips.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚的N900手机使用了ARM芯片。

sentences.english: Nokia's path is certain pain followed by an uncertain future.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚的前进道路上必然荆棘丛生，前途渺茫。

sentences.english: Nokia is an outsized part of the small Nordic country's economy -and self-image.
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚公司在这个北欧小国经济体中显得异常庞大。

definition: three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
Xiaomi, Chinese electronics company founded in 2010
phablet (hybrid between a smart phone and a tablet)
